institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing Employment Incentive Payment and Operation Rules/Article 6 (Examination of Payment Requirements)
contents: Article 6 (Examination of Payment Requirements) ① The Chairman of the Board shall review the following contents through the documents submitted by the payment applicant in accordance with Article 5: 1. Whether the payment applicant's continuous employment period according to the payment plan in Article 4 is appropriate. , 2. Whether or not the applicant for payment is engaged in the same occupation as the occupation selected by a Korean master craftsman or the occupation awarded at the International Skills Olympics, 3. Other matters separately determined by the chairman to determine payment of incentives, ② When reviewing the period of employment under paragraph 1, subparagraph 1 If the period of not engaging in the relevant occupation is less than 30 days per year, that period is counted as the period of continuous employment.
